ADT_Tweets module¶

class data_preparation.ADT_Tweets.TweetsByCountries(data_base)¶

Bases: object

Abstract data type that gives an opportunity to make actions with data from twitter posts

clean_locations()¶

Additional method to clean locations, that means to make locations more readable and make them fitting the library

Returns

list with cleared locations

get_amount_in_country(country)¶

Returns amount of suicidal tweets in a given country if this country exists in dictionary data storage

Parameters

country – name of a country in a string form

Returns

int, the amount of posts in a given country

tweets_amount_db()¶

A method that uses both database with all the cities in various countries and makes requests on geonames to later count suicidal post on Twitter dividing the amount on location by countries

Returns

dictionary of a look {‘country’: num_of_tweets}

tweets_amount_geonames()¶

Method to get amount of tweets in certain countries using geonames

Unfortunately, works with a limited amount of requests, so be careful using it in your code. It has approximately 1000 requests available in one hour

Returns

dictionary of a look {‘country’: num_of_tweets}

write_into_file()¶

Writes data into a json file to store it because of a limitation of requests

Returns

data_preparation.ADT_Tweets.initial_file()¶

A method to create initial file view

Returns
